data.description:
# 🔥🏐🥚 Spike before you get cooked ! 🥚🏐🔥

Get ready to crack up with Volleggball, the egg-citing volleyball game that'll have you jump for victory! 

This yolk-tastic multiplayer experience is no chicken feed – it's a shell-shocking adventure that'll keep you coming back for more!

![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75361353_1045102039797002_7060094311243211613_n.png?_nc_cat=110&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=9k8eqDj4E2YQ7kNvgHch1Zs&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYDqlS8pRqv0Y5CUogEoREivwGlKYa3zzNpRPjKZp3HpiQ&oe=66CB00AA)

## 🐣 Scramble with your friends🐣 

Jump into open lobbies and get cracking with players from around the globe!

## 👐 Sunny-side up gameplay 👐

Choose between 1vs1 or 2vs2 matches for the perfect serving of competition

## 🥚Hilarious AI Opponents🥚

Face off against funny, clumsy egg bots that'll keep you laughing as you play

## 😎 Egg-spressive customization 😎 

Stand out from the carton with dozens of ways to personalize your egg-vatar

## 🏝️ Eggs-quisite environments 🏝️

Spike your way through 4 egg-mazing maps: 
- Tropical Island Paradise
- Autumn Lake Splendor
- Winter Mountain Wonderland
- Volcanic Inferno (careful not to get poached!)

🔥🏐🥚

Whether you're a seasoned pro or just out of your shell, Volleggball offers an egg-citing VR experience that's no yolk! So don't chicken out – grab your friends and get ready to scramble the competition in this egg-ceptional volleyball adventure!

🥚🏐🔥

---
🎙️Chat with us on our discord ! https://discord.gg/NvRjfSnmma
